title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs with POJO mappings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience wrapper CLI that adds prompts, templates and shell integration shortcuts on top of ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling options.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat interface that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into channels via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store with LangChain.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline example that pulls an Ollama model, runs tests and builds a containerized app.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and systemd service for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a remote LLM endpoint for Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-azure
summary: ARM/Bicep templates to deploy Ollama on Azure Container Instances with GPU and secure networking.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers over the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
